| Property             | Attribute             | Description                 | Type     | Default     |
| -------------------- | --------------------- | --------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `backgroundColour`   | `background-colour`   | Optional background colour. | `string` | `undefined` |
| `fontSize`           | `font-size`           | Optional font size..        | `string` | `undefined` |
| `headingLevel`       | `heading-level`       | Optional Heading level.     | `number` | `undefined` |
| `horizontalPosition` | `horizontal-position` | Horizontal position.        | `string` | `'left'`    |
| `spacing`            | `spacing`             | Optional Spacing.           | `string` | `undefined` |
| `text`               | `text`                | Hero text.                  | `string` | `undefined` |
| `textAlign`          | `text-align`          | Optional text align.        | `string` | `'left'`    |
| `textColour`         | `text-colour`         | Optional text colour.       | `string` | `undefined` |
| `verticalPosition`   | `vertical-position`   | Vertical position.          | `string` | `'top'`     |
